modules.name: master_thesis

hasLecturer.name: University teachers, auxiliary professors, honorary professors and senior academic staff members of the School of Business informatics and mathematics or of the School of Social Sciences.

hasPersonInCharge.name: Supervisors of other faculties are possible upon application to the examination board and after examination of the content.

modules.additionalPrerequisite: To be permitted to write the master thesis, the student is to obtain at least 60 ECTS
